titleStmt.title: Despatch from Robert S. Newton to the Assistant Secretary of State, November 11, 1884

bibl.title: Despatch from Robert S. Newton to the Assistant Secretary of State
Despatches from United States Consuls in St Paul Loanda

div1.p: a great quantity of goods for trade; the loss is estimated at £15,000.
The Dutch have attacked the natives and burnt a number of villages and taken the King and Queen of Caicamazio prisoners.

I found the German Man of War "Moewe" had been at Banana taking Coal and sailed for Angra Pequena on the 16th September. She had Dr Nachtigal on board and I heard that a large German Expedition is reported as about to start form Angra Pequena for the Upper Congo, so no doubt Dr Nachtigal has gone there to weet them
At Landana I found the French
